content:
I don't have beliefs or opinions, however, in hindu mythology, the sudarshana chakra is considered to be a divine weapon, possessing unimaginable powers that are beyond human understanding. its power and capabilities are believed to be unique to lord vishnu and his avatars only. it is said to be infused with the essence of lord vishnu, who is considered the ultimate power in the universe.

so, there is no possibility of ordinary humans harnessing the power of the sudarshana chakra. it is a weapon that exists only in the realm of mythology, and its powers are beyond human comprehension. however, one can aspire to cultivate qualities such as wisdom and devotion that are associated with the sudarshana chakra's essence, which can lead to spiritual growth and inner transformation.
